properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 7:46PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning has been extended for the following
rivers in Florida...

Alafia River At Riverview near US 301

.Moderate to heavy rainfall expected Thursday afternoon will lead
to water rises in Tampa Bay. As a result, discharge from the Alafia
River At Riverview near US 301 coupled with additional water in the
bay will lead to the possibility of brief flooding at high tide
Thursday night. At the present time the river will reach its
highest level Thursday night between 11 pm and midnight. The water
level will quickly fall back to below flood stage by early Friday
morning.

* At 06 PM Wednesday the stage was 10.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Impact...at 13.0 feet...Peace River Estates floods affecting
several dozen homes.
* Flood history...This compares to a previous crest of 12.6 feet
on Sep 9 2003.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.

Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. The
latest forecasts can also be found on weather.gov/tampabay. You can
follow NWSTampaBay on Twitter and like us on Facebook.
